item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 19, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Glass Antenna Turns windows into 5G Base Stations (122 points | 64 comments)
2. Show HN: Chili. Rust port of Spice, a low-overhead parallelization library (134 points | 12 comments)
3. OpenNMS: Visualize and monitor everything on your local and distributed networks (26 points | 24 comments)

5. Diatom Arrangements (86 points | 17 comments)
6. Aviator (YC S21) is hiring engineers to build open source stacked PRs CLI ( | hide)
7. Show HN: A CLI tool I made to self-host any app with two commands on a VPS (113 points | 29 comments)
8. Quantum researchers cause controlled 'wobble' in the nucleus of a single atom (22 points | 13 comments)
9. Show HN: Selectable – mobile-friendly Postgres client (25 points | 6 comments)

11. JVM statistics cause garbage collection pauses (2015) (36 points | 14 comments)

19. Pivotal Tracker will shut down (193 points | 135 comments)

21. Seeing Like a Network (21 points | 5 comments)

23. Vapour: A typed superset of the R programming language (31 points | 15 comments)
24. Show HN: Comparisons – Gemini-1-5-vs-ChatGPT-4o (3 points | discuss)
25. Show HN: ts-remove-unused – Remove unused code from your TypeScript project (105 points | 54 comments)
26. Tortured by regrets? A new study details how best to overcome them (59 points | 47 comments)
27. The "R" in MTTR: Repair or Recover? What's the Difference? (4 points | discuss)
